metadataAttributes.Title: Expressway to Data Science: Essential Math Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn Mathematical Foundations for Data Science. Review key concepts in algebra, calculus, linear algebra, and numerical analysis that are critical for Data Science.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Derrivatives, Integrals, Matrix Algebra, Diagonalization, Numerical Analysis, Derivatives, Algebra, Singular Value Decomposition (SVD), root-finding, Partial Derivative, matrix diagonalization,
